gwt.material.design.client.base

Interface HasError

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTextWidget, AbstractValueWidget, Code, ErrorMixin, Italic, MaterialDatePicker, MaterialDoubleBox, MaterialFloatBox, MaterialIntegerBox, MaterialListBox, MaterialListValueBox, MaterialLongBox, MaterialNumberBox, MaterialRange, MaterialSearch, MaterialSwitch, MaterialTextArea, MaterialTextBox, MaterialValueBox, Pre, Small, Strong

    public interface HasError

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearErrorOrSuccess()
      Clear the error or success states.
      void setError(String error)
      Errors occur when an app fails to complete what is expected, such as: - The app does not understand user input - The system or app fails - A user intends to run incompatible operations concurrently
      void setHelperText(String helperText)
      Apply a widgets help text.
      void setSuccess(String success)
      Set the success message marking a widget as success.

    • Method Detail
